contents:
一小撮膜乎网友："You are the last major R18+ content contributor in the whole site! Am I wrong?"

换头黄文作者："Of course. This is a big mistake"

一小撮膜乎网友："You are!"

换头黄文作者："Very frank speaking, I don't agree with your point I'm an R18+ content contributor" .

一小撮膜乎网友："I know you don't. I know that you don't. But there's an old American phrase that if it an article reads like a porn and sounds like a porn and so forth, it's R18+ content."
